Core:PCProperties.Core:Property:
"\
MIki\\\r\\n\\\r\\nThis is MIki, the internal Skotos wiki system. You are currently viewing the \main\ web, which is also the \server-wide \web.\\\r\\n\\\r\\nIn general, there are three webs:\\\r\\n\\\r\\n \
[skotos.index_\|The Skotos-wide web], which contains Skotos-wide stuff. You should probably not edit that one.\\\r\\n \
[main.index_\|The server web], which you are currently viewing.\\r\\nYou may edit this page and add links or such that relate to this\\r\\nserver. If multiple games exist on this server, be sure to play fair.\\\r\\n \
Game-specific web(s), which can be anything from specific project\\r\\nwebs to a \\"game web\\" that includes everything about your game. You can\\r\\nhave as many webs are you want, and creating them is a simple matter.\\r\\nThe [skotos.index_\|Skotos] web contains further information on that,\\r\\nand other, topics related to MIki.\\\r\\n\\\r\\n-Kalle.\\\r\\n\\\r\\n"
